activities: The ON24 services are comprised of web-based tools used for the development and production of customizable webcasts with synchronized slides and interactivity (Q&A, audience polling, surveys, etc.). The audience interfaces, which typically include registration, lobby page, and player console, may require individuals to enter data such as name, corporation for which they work, email address, and other general information.  ON24 will not collect payment data online or request such information during the course of the webcast.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: If an individual is unsatisfied with ON24’s resolution of the compliant, then ON24 or that individual may file a request for mediation of a privacy issue with JAMS at http://www.jamsadr.com/ or via our address listed above.
